description: This spicy tofu stew is simple, nourishing and quick for busy evenings with little time to cook.
name: Spicy Tofu & Vegetable Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and finely sliced
400g carrots, peeled and sliced into batons

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat. Cook the onion and tofu for 5 minutes, add the carrots, mushrooms and cabbage and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic and chilli paste and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the chopped tomatoes, add half a can of water and simmer for 15 minutes until thickened. Serve with chopped coriander on top.
